title: Need to guard is_interactive better
body:
While running benchmarks I noted that `time_ls*` ones were failing.
Running
```shell
asv run -j 4 --machine drogon-neurodebian10.20190322.1 -q -e -v -b api.supers.time_ls
```
helped to identify the reason:
```
                 File "/home/yoh/proj/datalad/datalad/venvs/benchmark-10.20190322.1/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/asv/benchmark.py", line 569, in benchmark_timing
                   timing = timer.timeit(number)
                 File "/usr/lib/python2.7/timeit.py", line 202, in timeit
                   timing = self.inner(it, self.timer)
                 File "/usr/lib/python2.7/timeit.py", line 100, in inner
                   _func()
                 File "/home/yoh/proj/datalad/datalad/venvs/benchmark-10.20190322.1/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/asv/benchmark.py", line 474, in <lambda>
                   func = lambda: self.func(*param)
                 File "/home/yoh/proj/datalad/datalad/benchmarks/api.py", line 126, in time_ls
                   ls(self.ds.path)
                 File "/home/yoh/proj/datalad/datalad/.asv/env/1b5862776063636a1bd6a1931ef20cce/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/datalad/interface/ls.py", line 149, in __call__
                   return _ls_json(loc, json=json, **kw) if json else _ls_dataset(loc, **kw)
                 File "/home/yoh/proj/datalad/datalad/.asv/env/1b5862776063636a1bd6a1931ef20cce/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/datalad/interface/ls.py", line 484, in _ls_dataset
                   path_fmt = u"{ds.path!U:<%d}" % (maxpath + (11 if is_interactive() else 0))  # + to accommodate ansi codes
                 File "/home/yoh/proj/datalad/datalad/.asv/env/1b5862776063636a1bd6a1931ef20cce/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/datalad/utils.py", line 210, in is_interactive
                   return sys.stdin.isatty() and sys.stdout.isatty() and sys.stderr.isatty()
               ValueError: I/O operation on closed file
```
according to http://datalad.github.io/datalad/#api.supers.time_ls , the last commit which was successfully benchmarked was https://github.com/datalad/datalad/commit/3bcc58fa in Aug 8 2018... but that doesn't give me an immediate idea on what has happened since code for the is_interactive seemed to have no changes since then.

Will check in more detail later
